sentence: The House Freedom Caucus will hold a hearing Tuesday to analyze how President Joe Biden’s border policies have affected migration at the southern border after Biden’s first year in office ended with record-breaking numbers of illegal migrant apprehensions.The hearing will feature several members of the Freedom Caucus, including the new caucus chairman, Rep. Scott Perry (R-PA), as well as key border officials, including the U.S. Border Patrol union president, Brandon Judd.The hearing begins at 3:00 p.m. and is taking place at the FreedomWorks headquarters in Washington, DC.
author: Ashley Oliver
title: Watch Live: Freedom Caucus Holds Hearing on Biden’s Border Policies After Record-Breaking Year of Illegal Migration

sentence: 'America's incompetent right now,' said TV host Ben Ferguson as he warned that adversaries were taking advantage +20 View gallery Former President Trump called into Fox News on Wednesday to claim the attack would not have happened on his watch +20 View gallery Rep Scott Perry was among the Republicans who took to Twitter to blast Biden for Putin's aggression in Ukraine +20 View gallery Others warned that America's allies were watching what was unfolding and see American weakness on the world stage +20 View gallery A steady stream of Republicans tweeted their anger at Biden and warned that the country's enemies would be watching.
title: 'This is what happens when America’s enemies see a weak and incompetent President': Scores of Republicans join calls that Biden is 'unfit' and responsible for letting Putin invade Ukraine
